name: azure-cli
description: Azure CLI development environment with tools

scripts.setup:
# Update package lists
apt-get update

# Install Azure CLI
curl -sL https://aka.ms/InstallAzureCLIDeb | bash

# Create workspace
mkdir -p /workspace
scripts.postInstall:
# Clean up
apt-get clean
apt-get autoremove -y

# Show Azure CLI version
az version

echo "Azure CLI environment ready!"
